name: Sindrian Diktat Blueprint Package
desc: This blueprint package contains instructions enabling heavy industry to build Diktat-patented ship and weapon designs. The schematics are intermittently populated with text files containing propaganda burbs and self-reminders from overworked engineers.

name: # Lion's Guard Blueprint Package
desc: (DEPRECATED DUE TO VANILLA LG BPS) This rare blueprint package contains instructions enabling heavy industry to build ship designs of the elite Lion's Guard. The schematics are barely distinguishable from the copious amounts of propaganda texts populating the package files.
